name: Real Sheet Collection
description:
Playing tabletop RPG games has never been easier:
select your favorite game and start creating the character!

Quickly and easily access all your RPG game characters. You can modify them intuitively, create reusable models, save data and share them to your friends.


======================================

APPLICATION FEATURES

• Choice of many tabletop RPG games
• Creation of editable character sheets
• Automatic main list, with main datas of each character
• Dice table integrated into each sheet
• Selective note area for each character
• Print your sheets via Apple AirPrint
• Generate PDF sheet file
• Share your characters


======================================

QUICK MODE

• In each sheet, tap with 3 fingers on the screen to instantly show the dice table


======================================

PREMIUM FEATURES

• Unlimited number of character sheets
• Sheet models: create, save and reuse them by Dropbox integration
• No advertising


======================================

GAMES SUPPORTED (at this release)

• Pathfinder
• Advanced Dungeons & Dragons
• Dungeons & Dragons 3.0 edition
• Dungeons & Dragons 3.5 edition
• Dungeons & Dragons 4th edition
• Dungeons & Dragons 5th edition
• Human: New World of Darkness
• Vampire: The Requiem
• Werewolf: The Forsaken
• Mage: The Awakening
• Promethean: The Created
• Changeling: The Lost
• Hunter: The Vigil
• Geist: The Sin-Eaters


======================================

Tested for months by two different groups of RPG players with more than 10 years of experience!
